name: screengraph
description: AI-driven crawling and verification system for mobile and web apps

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd agent && npm run dev" "cd ui && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run ports:kill && npm run dev
scripts.dev:restart: npm run ports:kill && sleep 2 && npm run dev
scripts.ports:kill: lsof -ti tcp:3000 | xargs -r kill -9 && lsof -ti tcp:3001 | xargs -r kill -9
